definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: Lower yourself into a half-sitting position above the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 以半坐的姿勢蹲在便池上方。

sentences.english: In each of the urinals , there is a little printed blue fly.
sentences.chinese: 在每個小便池中，都印着一個小綠頭蒼蠅。

sentences.english: When they are ready, most boys stand in front of the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 他們身體長大了，多數的男孩是站在便池前小便。

sentences.english: They did right to put him up over a urinal : meeting of the waters.
sentences.chinese: 他們把他這座銅像豎在一座小便池上，倒是做對了。

sentences.english: It's a small plastic bucket with a crotch cup and a vacuum.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個小的塑料桶狀空間，有便池和真空管。

sentences.english: Early toilet bowls were painted cast iron and had no flange on the rim.
sentences.chinese: 早期的便池是在鑄鐵表面塗上油漆，且上口沒有凸緣。

sentences.english: Therefore, the long-time flushing for urinals produces a large waste of water.
sentences.chinese: 因此小便池長時間沖水就造成水的極大浪費。

sentences.english: But they left the urinals in.
sentences.chinese: 但是他們留下了小便池。

sentences.english: It turned out to be a fly pattern on the surface of urinal.
sentences.chinese: 仔細一看，原來這是一隻印在小便池表面的蒼蠅圖案。

sentences.english: Three engineers were in the bathroom standing at the urinals .
sentences.chinese: 三個工程師站在洗手間的小便池前。

sentences.english: The light - control urinal flushing machine can save a lot of water.
sentences.chinese: 光控的便池沖水器能夠節約很多水。

sentences.english: A room equipped with toilets and lavatories for public use.
sentences.chinese: 配備有便池與洗手池供公衆使用的房間。

sentences.english: MORE…In each of the urinals , there is a little printed blue fly.
sentences.chinese: 在每個小便池中，都印着一個小綠頭蒼蠅。

sentences.english: Use the special fiber cloth with sprayed detergent to wipe the outside wall of the urinal.
sentences.chinese: 用噴灑過清潔劑的專用化纖布擦拭小便池外壁。

definition: chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
Turkish toilet/squat toilet/to vacate one's bowels
